autotransform.runner package

Submodules

autotransform.runner.base module

The base class and associated classes for Runner components.

class autotransform.runner.base.Runner(params: autotransform.runner.base.TParams)

Bases: Generic[autotransform.runner.base.TParams], abc.ABC

The base for Runner components. Used by AutoTransform to run an AutoTransformSchema, either locally on the machine or on remote infrastructure.

_params

The paramaters that control operation of the Runner. Should be defined using a TypedDict in subclasses.

Type

TParams

bundle() → autotransform.runner.base.RunnerBundle

Generates a JSON encodable bundle. If a component’s params are not JSON encodable this method should be overridden to provide an encodable version.

Returns

The encodable bundle.

Return type

RunnerBundle

abstract static from_data(data: Mapping[str, Any]) → autotransform.runner.base.Runner

Produces an instance of the component from decoded params. Implementations should assert that the data provided matches expected types and is valid.

Parameters

data (Mapping[str, Any]) – The JSON decoded params from an encoded bundle.

Returns

An instance of the Runner.

Return type

Runner

abstract static get_type() → autotransform.runner.type.RunnerType

Used to map Runner components 1:1 with an enum, allowing construction from JSON.

Returns

The unique type associated with this Runner.

Return type

RunnerType

abstract run(schema: autotransform.schema.schema.AutoTransformSchema) → None

Triggers a full run of a Schema.

Parameters

schema (AutoTransformSchema) – The schema that will be run.

class autotransform.runner.base.RunnerBundle

Bases: TypedDict

A bundled version of the Runner object used for JSON encoding.

params: Mapping[str, Any]
type: autotransform.runner.type.RunnerType

autotransform.runner.factory module

A simple factory for producing Runners from type and param information.

class autotransform.runner.factory.RunnerFactory

Bases: object

The factory class for Runners. Maps a type to a Runner.

_map

A mapping from RunnerType to the from_data function of the appropriate Runner.

Type

Dict[RunnerType, Callable[[Mapping[str, Any]], Runner]]

static get(bundle: autotransform.runner.base.RunnerBundle) → autotransform.runner.base.Runner

Simple get method using the _map attribute.

Parameters

bundle (RunnerBundle) – The bundled Runner type and params.

Returns

An instance of the associated Runner.

Return type

Runner

autotransform.runner.github module

A GithubberRunner component, which is used to trigger a workflow on Github which runs a schema.

class autotransform.runner.github.GithubRunner(params: autotransform.runner.base.TParams)

Bases: autotransform.runner.base.Runner[autotransform.runner.github.GithubRunnerParams]

A Runner component that is used to trigger Github workflows. See data/workflows/autotransform_runner.yml.

_params

The paramaters that control operation of the Runner.

Type

GithubRunnerParams

Parameters

Returns

RunnerType

run(schema: autotransform.schema.schema.AutoTransformSchema) → None

Triggers a full run of a Schema by submitting a workflow run to the Github repo in the Schema.

Parameters

schema (AutoTransformSchema) – The schema that will be run.

class autotransform.runner.github.GithubRunnerParams

Bases: TypedDict

The params required for a GithubRunner instance.

workflow: Union[str, int]

autotransform.runner.local module

A GithubberRunner component, which is used to trigger a workflow on Github which runs a schema.

class autotransform.runner.local.LocalRunnerParams

autotransform.runner.type module

The type of Runner, used create a 1:1 mapping.

class autotransform.runner.type.RunnerType(value)

Bases: str, enum.Enum

A simple enum for 1:1 Runner to type mapping.

GITHUB = 'github'
LOCAL = 'local'

Module contents

Runner components are responsible for handling the running of AutoTransform schemas. They can trigger runs on remote infrastructure or locally on a given machine.
